mil.nga.geopackage.extension

Class GeometryExtensions

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.geopackage.extension.BaseExtension
      • mil.nga.geopackage.extension.GeometryExtensions

  • public class GeometryExtensions
extends BaseExtension
    Geometry Extensions utility methods and constants https://www.geopackage.org/spec/#extension_geometry_types
    Author:
    osbornb
